snippet: An investigation into the New York antiquities dealer Subhash Kapoor has led to the arrest of his sister, accused of hiding statues looted from India.
abstract: Manhattan district attorney’s office and federal authorities expand their investigation into antiquities smuggling by Subhash Kapoor, longtime Upper East Side art dealer who is accused of selling looted items from India that have ended up in private collections and museums; office arrests his sister, Sushma Sareen, on charges that she is hiding 4 bronze statues looted from India.
lead_paragraph: An investigation into the New York antiquities dealer Subhash Kapoor has led to the arrest of his sister, accused of hiding statues looted from India.

headline.main: New Arrest in Inquiry on Art Looting
headline.print_headline: New Arrest In Inquiry On Art Looting
